title: Ribair Rodríguez
text:
Ribair Rodríguez Pérez (born 4 October 1987 in <a href="Montevideo%2C%20Uruguay">Montevideo</a>) is a Uruguayan <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er currently playing for <a href="Danubio%20F.C.">Danubio</a> in Uruguay.
Rodríguez previously played for <a href="Club%20Universidad%20de%20Guadalajara">Leones Negros</a> in the <a href="Ascenso%20MX">Ascenso MX</a>.
